about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Daibouken.

Step into the boots of Aurora, a destined heroine, in this third-person action-adventure RPG, and embark on an epic quest to shatter a relentless time-loop that has ensnared the world in unending stagnation. Explore breathtaking landscapes and tackle four mysterious dungeons, each holding the key to breaking a segment of the time-loop. Unravel the secrets of a rich, ancient history, and solve intricate puzzles. As you journey through this fantastical realm, discover and master powerful relic weapons that could alter the fabric of fate. Are you ready to forge your legend and restore the flow of time? The adventure of a lifetime awaits—seize your destiny now!

STORY


Embark on "Daibouken: Yarinaosu," a thrilling RPG that perfectly blends the excitement of a Big Adventure (大冒険) with the challenge of Starting Again (やり直す) in the enchanting region of Rastar. Join Aurora on a daring journey through a perilous five-day time-loop brimming with divine intrigue and ancient secrets. Each day brings fresh mysteries and choices, pushing you to master the art of time and fate as you uncover your true potential and reshape destiny. Immerse yourself in a captivating story where every decision has a lasting impact. Will you break free from the loop, or will you forge a new path? Dive in, make your choices, and thrive in this epic adventure.


In the world of Daibouken, the Creator gave up his life to grant humanity freedom, leaving the gods in charge of shaping destiny. While humans enjoy the gift of free will—a trait the gods envy—their strong spirits also enhance the gods' powers. This divine cycle, meant to honor the Creator’s legacy, is disrupted by the gods' ambitions. They compete for dominance, drawing ambitious humans into their struggles. Tempted by the promise of divine power, these humans commit dark deeds to collect souls for the gods they worship. In exchange, the gods grant them fearsome beasts to aid in their sinister quests. Amid this turmoil, some extraordinary individuals are born as demigods, blessed with unique abilities that distinguish them in a world torn between divine intrigue and mortal conflict.
